hero_section.title: Book an appointment quickly with a healthcare professional
hero_section.description: Select your doctor, choose your appointment date and time, and receive a confirmation by SMS or email.
hero_section.subtitle_step2: Sign in to your personal space

whySection.title: Why choose Assistini?
whySection.description_1: Assistini is an innovative platform that revolutionizes how you manage your medical appointments. In a world where time is precious, we simplify your healthcare experience by offering a unified and intuitive solution.
whySection.description_2: Our mission is to make managing your health simpler and more accessible. Assistini is not just a scheduling tool — it’s your personal health assistant, guiding you throughout your care journey.

rdv_section.title: Why book an appointment with us?
rdv_section.description: With Assistini, book your doctor’s appointment online — simply and efficiently.

partner_section.title: Our partners
partner_section.description: Some of the latest and greatest collaborations from us here at Assistini.
